text: All human beings are commingled out of good and evil.

text: Speak ill of no man, but speak all the good you know of everybody.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: I keep my ideals, because in spite of everything I still believe that people are really good at heart.

text: But I say to you, Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you, so that you may be sons of your Father who is in heaven for he makes his sun rise on the evil and on the good, and sends rain on the just and on the unjust.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

author: Plato

text: I look back on my life like a good day's work, it was done and I am satisfied with it.
author: Grandma Moses

text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

text: It is practically impossible to teach good programming to students that have had a prior exposure to BASIC: as potential programmers they are mentally mutilated beyond hope of regeneration.
author: Edsger Dijkstra
